title: Speech to Text
description: A speech recognition application that converts spoken words into text. Features real-time transcription, multiple language support, and audio processing capabilities.

title: Text to QR
description: A utility application that converts text input into QR codes. Generate QR codes for URLs, contact information, or any text content with customizable styling options.

title: HTML Fight
description: An interactive web-based application demonstrating modern HTML, CSS, and JavaScript capabilities for creating engaging user interactions.

title: Brick Breaker Remake
description: A classic game remake built with Java for Android, demonstrating mobile development principles and object-oriented design patterns.
